channel.title: Client stuck at 1%
channel.description:
[center] Hello[/center]
Problem: http://gyazo.com/f395fe957894b2eee5146ec5f32e6844 (Client get's stuck at 1%) Source: Disturbed V2.2 Client: Disturbed Client Other Information: I've changed the ip in Loader.java to my no-ip (insanepkzserver.no-ip.biz), my port is open: http://gyazo.com/c58a8d5349efee72316def52c4f8447f I've tried changing it back to 127.0.0.1 and same thing happens :/
PS. I haven't tried hosting a server in years, sorry if this is nooby :p

item.title: Client stuck at 1%
item.dc:creator: @24jared24 24jared24
item.description:
@24jared24 wrote:

I dont have a firewall, and i know my no-ip is working.

Read full topic

item.title: Client stuck at 1%
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Turn off your firewall and make sure your No-IP is running. Make sure the client is compiled on the correct IP too.

Read full topic

item.title: Client stuck at 1%
item.dc:creator: @24jared24 24jared24
item.description:
@24jared24 wrote:

I have the cache in the right spot, it worked for me before i tried changing the ip’s…

Read full topic

item.title: Client stuck at 1%
item.dc:creator: @Harvi Harvi
item.description:
@Harvi wrote:

It might not have autocache downloader which means you have to manually put the cache into ur c: drive with winrar, idk that client check the post again and fine the cache.

Read full topic
